item.title: Cigarettes all over floor from broken Cigarette bin at the red lion pub, 29th November
item.description:
Their cigarette bin is broken and there is a pile of cigarettes on the floor. There are lots of dogs in the area
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hoxton Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree covered in dog poo, 29th November
item.description:
I reported this issue a couple of days ago and it said it had been fixed. This is not the case, the tree as pictured is still covered in dog poo bags. It’s absolutely disgusting and not far from outside Thomas Tallis so all the school kids have to walk past this everyday.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kidbrooke Park Road, Kidbrooke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Vehicles, 29th November
item.description:
Two abandoned vehicles have been dumped on Cavendish Avenue. Both have remained unmoved for several months and appear to be potentially unroadworthy. No owners have returned to them, and they are taking up residential parking space and attracting anti-social behaviour.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cavendish Avenue, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dropped Glass Bottle, 29th November
item.description:
Water glass bottle has been dropped accidentally. Most (biggest) parts have been collected.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yet more tents, 29th November
item.description:
Last week there was one tent here. Now there are three. I've reported these and nothing has been done. Currently 7 tents on Winn's that I've spotted.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Felspar Close, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken branch, 29th November
item.description:
The tree in the picture is in the park alongside the bungalows at 19-25 Godstow Road SE2 9AT. The branch is broken and may fall at anytime. It’s an accident waiting to happen. Recently, branches on other trees have fallen, it’s amazing no-one has been injured, or worse! All the trees need a full structural survey before the unthinkable happens.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Godstow Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Caravan parked on the road, 29th November
item.description:
Dumped caravan on Mayow rd near junction of earlsthorpe rd for the last 6 months possibly being lived in. Taking up a parking space.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 140-149, Mayow Road, Perry Vale, Sydenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain again, 29th November
item.description:
Hi, This drain is blocked again, happens every year. Last time it took at least a few call outs. Dangerous when icy. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Widmore, Greater London

item.title: Cigarette Litter in Playground, 29th November
item.description:
Residents 1-6 Athelstan House are smoking in the back area OR throwing cigarette butts into the playground from balconies or while inside it. This has been happening for a long time and is unsafe for children. Please send a letter to address this issue.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Londesborough Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
